hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Spirit Temple Small Key# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of #gold#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #2 Deku Scrubs#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

GC (Maze).text: They say that the song written in the #royal tomb# is #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of #gold#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Zora Shop#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Temple of Time# chimes with the music of #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #3# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: Hi! I'm currently on an exchange program from Termina.^They say that East Clock Town is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Water Temple Small Key# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Red Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that tossing a bomb will cause a Blue Bubble to go after it.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Game Key# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Stray Fairy#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path of #gold#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #2# major items.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #gold#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that Barinade fears Deku Nuts.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Red Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #3# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #2# major items.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #grave with a free chest#.
